profile.name: Kemal Ardian
profile.title: Web and Mobile Programmer
profile.bio: Engineered and launched confidential, high-scale applications for clients in education, e-commerce, and B2B services, driving over 100,000 total usages across all projects.

education.description: Currently pursuing degree in Applied Informatics Engineering

experience.title: Freelance
responsibilities: Engineered and launched confidential, high-scale applications for clients in education, e-commerce, and B2B services, driving over 100,000 total usages across all projects
Architected full-stack solutions using Flutter (Mobile/Web), TypeScript (Backend/Frontend), and Go, implementing clean architecture, state management, and REST/GraphQL APIs
Owned the complete development lifecycle from concept to deployment, optimizing for performance, security, and user experience

achievements.title: Mahasiswa Berprestasi 2025
achievements.description: Selected as one of the 4 Outstanding Students of 2025 as a first semester student

achievements.title: Honorable Mention (45th) ICPC Asia Jakarta
achievements.description: Placed 45th in the prestigious ICPC Asia Jakarta Regional Contest, solving 2 complex algorithmic challenges against top university teams across Asia-Pacific

achievements.title: Honorable Mention (55th) ICPC Indonesia National Contest
achievements.description: Secured 55th position at the ICPC Indonesia National Contest, successfully solving 5 advanced programming problems in a highly competitive field

achievements.title: Silver Medal - KMIPN Hackathon Challenge
achievements.description: Won 2nd Place at the National Polytechnic Informatics Student Competition (KMIPN) Hackathon Challenge, leading the top-ranking first-year team

achievements.title: Bronze Medal - Srifoton Competitive Programming
achievements.description: Secured 3rd Place at Srifoton CP, one of Indonesia's most prestigious university-level competitive programming festivals

achievements.title: Finalist - Veternity Competitive Programming
achievements.description: Qualified as a finalist in the Veternity Competitive Programming contest, competing against Indonesia's top programming talents

achievements.title: Finalist - IFest Competitive Programming
achievements.description: Achieved finalist status at IFest CP hosted by Padjajaran University, one of Indonesia's leading institutions

achievements.title: Finalist - PingFest Competitive Programming
achievements.description: Reached the finals of PingFest CP organized by Sebelas Maret University, showcasing consistent competitive programming excellence

organizations.title: Member

Contributed to preparation of presentations and club activities to improve public speaking skills

assignments.title: Personal Portfolio Website

Create reusable template for other students
Showcase all assignments in one place
results: Deployed on Cloudflare Pages with 90+ Lighthouse score
Open source template available on GitHub
Premium UI with 3D WebGL elements and animations

assignments.title: TOR Kegiatan LKMM-TH

Ensure continuous learning and better mentorship
Create realistic and implementable event plan
results: Condensed event format with improved continuity
Comprehensive TOR following formal Indonesian standards

assignments.title: Infografis Teknologi & Karier
assignments.description: A3-sized infographic exploring career opportunities in technology sector with statistical data and visual storytelling
objectives: Create informative and engaging A3 infographic on Career theme
Present credible statistical data about tech industry
Demonstrate visual design and data visualization skills
Communicate complex information clearly and attractively
results: High-quality A3 infographic with professional design
Data-driven insights from credible sources (LinkedIn, BPS, etc.)
Engaging visual hierarchy and color scheme
Clear information delivery with balanced text and graphics

assignments.title: Video Solusi Strategis HCW & Fun Rutin

results: Comprehensive analysis of bureaucratic and management challenges
Professional video editing with clear narration
